SEARCH
Package realestate

Class RealEstateAgent

java.lang.Object
realestate.RealEstateAgent
public class RealEstateAgent extends Object
Class responsible for managing a collection of real estate properties and providing various operations like statistics, file input/output, and property analysis.

  • Field Summary

    • cheapestProperty

      public static RealEstate cheapestProperty()
      Finds and returns the cheapest property in the collection.
      Returns:
      The RealEstate object with the lowest price, or null if none exist

    • totalPriceAll

      public static int totalPriceAll()
      Calculates the sum of total prices for all properties.
      Returns:
      The combined total price of all properties

    • avgSqmRoomMostExpensiveBudapest

      public static double avgSqmRoomMostExpensiveBudapest()
      Determines the average square meters per room for the most expensive property located in Budapest.
      Returns:
      The average sqm per room, or 0 if no such property exists
